Text.Language: Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~nimwou n~te v~iaro: c~mou e~rwou: anitou e~p~swi kata nousi: kata v/e~te vwk n~h~mot.
Remember, O Lord, the waters of the river; bless them; raise them to their measure according to Your grace.
